descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][size=3][b][color=#b4a7d6][size=5][b]Skyrim version recommended to be 1.9.32.0 or higher [/b][/size][/color]

XPMSE OR A BBP SKELETON IS REQUIRED

[color=#85200C][size=4][b]   [color=#e06666] [/color][/b][/size][/color][/b][/size][color=#e06666][size=3][b][size=4][b] DAWNGUARD IS REQUIRED[/b][/size][/b][/size][/color][/size][/center]



[center][url=http://jpegshare.net/2c/cb/2ccb53b155c2a8edefb30fe6bcb8b8dc.jpg.html][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/66/cf/66cfd78e18ebd7a5941bbb05feeb0c41.jpg[/img][/url][/center][center]
[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/40/16/4016f88ab84168dd4dd038a5d42cb8e4.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=4][color=#b4a7d6]A little Vampire[/color] crossed paths with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78796/?]a Dying Necromancer[/url] who had just lost a battle against [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72722/?]a Young Flower Girl[/url],[/size]
[size=3]Vaermina's champion had lost, and some entity jumped from the Necromancer unto the unlucky woman.

Since that fateful day she has a thirst for something other than just blood.

Before the event she hunted alone, but after, she knows there is someone always watching her,
[color=#b4a7d6]especially when she sleeps...[/color]

Custom Armor.
[/size][size=3]Unique Custom Summon "Night Terror", a creature from Quagmire, Vaermina's Realm.[/size][size=3]

Necromancer spells and perks,

Uses Dawnguard Vampire Spells "Bats, Custom Spells Blood Siphon,and occasionally Conjure Night Terror"

Noname can be found near the [color=#b4a7d6][b]Nightcaller Temple[/b][/color] near [color=#b4a7d6]Dawnstar[/color]
[/size][/center][size=3]
